safety.modal.title: Account Safety Checklist
safety.modal.footer: This guide is a best practice to maintain your account stability and reputation.
safety.step.1.title: How 'Old' is Your Number?
safety.step.1.body: Numbers active for < 10 days are highly vulnerable to blocking if sending many messages. Ensure the number is 'mature' before using for campaigns.
safety.step.2.title: Two-Way Communication
safety.step.2.body: Avoid one-way communication. Ensure at least 30-40% of your messages get REPLIED to. Spam bots usually send without receiving replies.
safety.step.3.title: Saved in Their Contacts?
safety.step.3.body: The best anti-ban shield is when your number is saved by the recipient. Check your WhatsApp Status views; if there are 20+ viewers, you are safe.
safety.step.4.title: Active in Communities
safety.step.4.body: Join 3-5 WhatsApp groups and interact normally. 'Real' accounts always have a footprint of community activity.
safety.step.5.title: Complete Business Profile
safety.step.5.body: Don't leave your profile empty. Use a clear profile picture and fill in the Info/About section. 'Ghost' profiles are easy targets for auto-blocking.
safety.step.6.title: Vary Your Messages
safety.step.6.body: Don't just send monotonous text. Humans send images, stickers, and voice notes. Message variation makes your behavior pattern look natural.
crm.dev.title: Feature Under Development
crm.dev.desc: The CRM module is currently being built. This is a Preview (Mockup) of what is coming soon.
background.conflict.title: Task Already Running
background.conflict.scraping: Scraping is currently in progress. Please wait for it to complete or stop it before starting a campaign.
background.conflict.campaign: A campaign is currently in progress. Please wait for it to complete or stop it before starting scraping.
